header.name: Elastic Beam Gas Interactions in Arcs 7TeV Beam 2
header.desc: Elastic beam gas interactions in the arcs resulting in proton losses on the TCTV at 7TeV for Beam 2
header.misc: 100 beam lifetime: ProtLossProbPerTurn = 1/(LifeTime*BunchFreq) = 2.4702e-10, ProtLossFractionOnTct = ProtOnTct/ProtSim = 2.1e-4, BeamProtInFile = LossSim/(ProtLossProbPerTurn*ProtLossFractionOnTct) = 2.6314e17
